spec_data.Name: nextcloud
spec_data.License: AGPLv3+ and MIT and BSD and ASL 2.0 and WTFPL and CC-BY-SA and GPLv3+ and Adobe
spec_data.Description:
NextCloud gives you universal access to your files through a web interface or
WebDAV. It also provides a platform to easily view & sync your contacts,
calendars and bookmarks across all your devices and enables basic editing right
on the web. NextCloud is extendable via a simple but powerful API for
applications and plugins.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 01:16:43 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Private file sync and share server
